---
layout: cheatsheet
tags: remote admin tunneling sshfs scp port-forwarding
logo: data:image/svg+xml;base64,
section:
  - name: List all active connections on a server
    commands:
      - title: List sockets
        command: ss | grep ssh
      - title: List processes
        command: pgrep -ai sshd
        options:
          -a: "--list-full: List the full command line as well as the process ID."
          -i: "--ignore-case: Match processes case-insensitively."
---
